有香港人提供《和你飛》歌詞英譯如下，方便share 首歌俾外國朋友。


“Our Movement”

Do you hear the deafening cries?
How do you sooth the pain inside?
Will the fighting subside
just because you’re terrified?

How bad was the wound from blasting shots?
Will you tough it out no matter what?
Oh I cannot help but fear:
can you make it home from here ?

Chorus
Entrapped on streets we came together.
At shady corners we lost each other.
I won’t turn my back on my city or my brother.
I don’t want to run for a distant shelter.

This love goes beyond time and tides.
It flows through my veins inside.
Come rain or wind,
I’m in.

A hymn to save my home from falling.
What graceful sight.
But things keep evolving,
There’s no telling black from white.

We turn dumb with wailing
as we think of you in tears.
White flowers are our offering
to all we hold dear.

Chorus

Keep it up.
Love may be tough.
But how can we give up?

Another night that knows no slumber
as we live each crazy day.
Wipe the tears. Make our way.
These hands shall change things forever.

This love goes beyond time and tides.
It binds our weary hearts together.
Come lashing rain or whipping wind
We shall stay with one another.

In memories old
Through history told
The truth shall unfold.
